column4: im running ubuntu netbook edition how do i change the backround on the login screen?
You can't!  The feature was temporarily taken out when they moved to the new point release of gdm.
I googled.  There are some hacks apparently: http://n00bsonubuntu.com/content/how-change-login-screen-ubuntu-1004-lucid-lynx
No worries.  Many of those guides are hard to follow because of the number of things you have to do.
